text: Hey guys, what are good alternatives to JuliaHub if one wants to do cloud computing?  I mean, JuliaHub looks cool, but there is no free tier or anything.

elements.text: Hey guys, what are good alternatives to JuliaHub if one wants to do cloud computing?  I mean, JuliaHub looks cool, but there is no free tier or anything.

text: you can run julia on google collab somewhat. This thread comments about it <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/julia-on-google-colab-free-gpu-accelerated-shareable-notebooks/15319/42>

attachments.title: Julia on Google Colab: Free GPU-Accelerated Shareable Notebooks
attachments.text: Thanks for your kind words, Steven. I implemented your suggestions.
